body.p:
To his Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Governer of the State of Kentucky

Your Petitioners, would state that Michael Rice was fined by the judgment of the Bracken Circuit Court at its February term 1861 Twenty Dollars, and his son Daniel Rice was fined by said Court Ten Dollars for an assault upon upon the persons of Patrick Conroy.

They state that said Conroy & the Rices had a difficulty, and a Commonwealths warrant was issued against said Conroy, and he was fined by a jury of this County, and afterwards said Conroy procured their inditement, and they were fined as above -- they respectfully request that your Honor remit said fine so far as you are permitted to do.
